column4: I just got my comcast hooked up, and I have apache running, but for some reason people can't connect to me. I'm not connected to a router, so I shouldn't have to worry about ports, right?
I just got my comcast hooked up, and I have apache running, but for some reason people can't connect to me. I'm not connected to a router, so I shouldn't have to worry about ports, right?
I had comcast previously and they didn't.. things like that don't change from region to region, do they?
